comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
other wise known as exibit A
Why would he want to block what I have to imagine were "perfect calls"?
His cult following needs to know why ! I would think ??¿¿

These records do not belong to him, so I can’t see how he thinks he can refuse access to them. He never really understood that the President serves the people, not the other way around. Intellectually and morally corrupt to the core.
The guy who is always screaming things is rigged he sure tries to hide the shit he does.

Can’t they just hand over the documents and say “oops, too late”?

I mean, why not let me sue as well. I have no rights regarding WH
docs, but who cares.
Fuck the courts, the Biden admin needs to give Congress whatever they ask for, now.

I wish trumps dad had put this much effort into using a condom. 

The amount of effort trump puts into hiding all his shady dealings.
Once you allow a court to command your sitting head of state, you have stumbled into a form of tyranny that Thurgood Marshall warned about.

Most criminals try to stop evidence and or cover their tracks. This is why criminals should not be protected, no matter how many ppl love him or what their job used to be. 

Take out the trash.

> The latest court filing shows that among the documents held in the National Archive, the former president wants to keep privileged are records of his daily presidential diaries, activity logs, and call logs relating to January 6.  

There - now you don't have to read the shitty blog "article".

If this probe is truly a "witch hunt", then why not turn over all of the documents to prove innocence?

Methinks thou dost protest too much.
Time reveals all.... he will be judged as the most corrupt politician ever.  Just give it time.....
